Correct coordinates, making them from 0 to 20.

This function is called by fullplot.imageJ in the case that the maps are subquadrats to correct the coordinates and make them from 0 to 20 depending on what section of the map the subquadrat belongs to.

SectionCorrection(pts, subquad, gridsize, subquadsuffix)

Arguments

pts

the coordinates to be corrected
subquad

the subquadrat to be corrected
gridsize

Size of each individual map.
subquadratsuffix

Suffixes used to indicate what section of the map the subquadrat refers to. They should be named clockwise from the lower left. It can be used for map files that are smaller than 20x20m (i.e. 10x10m).

Contents

  • Arguments

Developed by Rick Condit, Pamela Hall, Suzanne Lao, Kyle Harms, Mauro Lepore, CTFS-ForestGEO.
